data.name: Bacalar reductions
data.desc: Sp reduce unknown number of Maya towns in Bacalar province
data.note:
[R]reductions must have been carried out from Bacalar as value of tributes from crown encomienda Mazanila = Mazanahau rose nearly fivefold from 71 pesos in 1605 to 325 pesos in 1606 /v Jones 131 /CONTADURIA,912 /
 Possibly see 1603-1606 Verapaz [Guat]. Pres Alonso Criado de Castillo sends frays Juan de Esguerra and Salvador Cipriano to reduce eight towns /v Soza [missg] = ed 2 vol 2 p 437
